ovdesc.p: The patch release file defines individual patch releases which can be
sent to clients. Patch releases are created from one or more pifs.
The items on each pif are used to populate the patch record, along with
the location of each item, according to the status of the pif when it
is entered. Items can be removed or the location of them amended if
necessary. When the record is verified, the relevant records and

desc.p: Fields PIF.NUMBERS to HD.REFS form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields MIN.RELEASE to DEPEND.ON form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the PIF.RELEASE.NO file.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.TIME form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields SAVED.VERSION to SAVED.TIME form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies the workset in which the patch is defined
Eg: GLOBUS:R05DEV
Fields SAVED.FROM to SAVED.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Fields SV.FILE.LOC to SV.RECORD.NAME form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field is for internal purpose of Patch release mechanism.
1)No Input field
2)Can be "Y" or "N"
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 50 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 30 characters may be entered.
Fields PIF.NUMBERS to HD.REFS form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Fields PIF.NUMBERS to HD.REFS form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Specifies the Client reference no of the Patch
Fields PIF.NUMBERS to HD.REFS form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 12 characters may be entered.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields SAVED.FROM to SAVED.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields SV.FILE.LOC to SV.RECORD.NAME form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies whether Dimensions is used for Items extraction
Validation rules
Can be Y/N
When set to "Y",it transfers the Change Documents from Dimensions to BP of User
Fields SV.FILE.LOC to SV.RECORD.NAME form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Holds the missing items in Change Documents
System tries to read the record from the object file just to make sure it existsIf it does not, add it to the missing items list.
Fields SAVED.FROM to SAVED.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields MIN.RELEASE to MAX.RELEASE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the PIF.RELEASE.NO file.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the PIF.RELEASE.NO file.
Fields SAVED.VERSION to SAVED.TIME form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies the product of the PATCH i.e GLOBUS
Identifies PIF number of the patch.
A maximum 1-25 numbers are allowed
Specifies the type of PIF.NUMBERS.
Can be BG,CI,EF and EN
Fields MIN.RELEASE to DEPEND.ON form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 12 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the PIF.CONTROL file.
Specifies the description of the patch
This is a multi valued field.
A maximum of 50 characters may be entered.
